duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist the Account Manager with supervisory, training, and operations functions at the assigned post
Coordinate all aspects of executing the security contract at the assigned location
Assign work tasks to Security Professionals and direct their work throughout the day
Supervise, motivate, coach, and train Security Professionals; evaluate their work performance and make recommendations regarding assignments
Ensure proper maintenance, cleaning, and organization of the Post and all other post and training information
Conduct interviews, evaluate new employees, and provide on-the-job training

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent required, some college education or business classes desirable
